job.name: S3

variable.name: SECRET_KEY
variable.description: Third-party credential storing the S3 Secret Key associated with the given Access Key

job.description: Import data from (or export data to) AWS S3. Before the execution, the user has to provide the `$ACCESS_KEY` value. Besides, this workflow templates requires the following third-party credential: {key: `ACCESS_KEY`, value: `SECRET_KEY`} Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials.

task.name: Export_to_S3
task.description: This task allows to export data to S3. The task requires the following third-party credential: {key: ACCESS_KEY, value: SECRET_KEY} Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials.

variable.name: LOCAL_RELATIVE_PATH
variable.description: Local relative path from which we upload file(s). LOCAL_RELATIVE_PATH can contain either a path to a file, a directory terminated by / or an empty value if you want to upload the whole localspace (user or global)

variable.name: REMOTE_RELATIVE_PATH
variable.description: Remote relative path to which we upload file(s). Empty value is allowed

variable.name: SECRET_KEY
variable.description: Third-party credential storing the user secret key associated with the given user access key

task.name: Import_from_S3
task.description: This task allows to import data from S3. The task requires the following third-party credential: {key: ACCESS_KEY, value: SECRET_KEY} Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials.

variable.name: LOCAL_RELATIVE_PATH
variable.description: Local relative path to which we download file(s) from S3. LOCAL_RELATIVE_PATH can contain either a path to a file, a directory terminated by / or an empty value if you want to download file(s) to the root of the localspace (user or global).

variable.name: S3_URL
variable.description: Specifies an S3 resource URL where the bucket name identifies the storage container and the key specifies a specific folder or file to download. In case the key is not specified, the entire bucket will be downloaded.

variable.name: SECRET_KEY
variable.description: Third-party credential storing the Secret Key associated with the given Access Key
